properties.title: All Front Doors: HTTP Status Mix (Stacked)
Compute CPU Utilization (EC2 / EKS Pod / ECS Task)
Compute Memory Utilization (EC2 / EKS Pod / ECS Task)

properties.query:
SOURCE logGroups(namePrefix: ["/aws/containerinsights/"], class: "STANDARD")  |
fields @timestamp, kubernetes.container_name as Container, kubernetes.namespace_name as Namespace, log
| filter log like /(?i)(error|exception|fatal|critical)/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50
properties.title: [EKS] Error Logs (Last 50)

properties.query:
SOURCE logGroups(namePrefix: ["/aws/containerinsights/"], class: "STANDARD")  |
fields kubernetes.container_name as Container, log
| filter not isblank(log)
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100
properties.title: [EKS] Recent Container Logs (Last 100)

properties.query:
SOURCE logGroups(namePrefix: ["/aws/ecs/"], class: "STANDARD")  |
fields @entity.KeyAttributes.Name as Service, @message
| sort @timestamp desc
| filter @log not like /containerinsights/
| limit 100
properties.title: [ECS] Recent Container Logs (Last 100)

properties.query:
SOURCE logGroups(namePrefix: ["/aws/lambda/"], class: "STANDARD")  |
fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /(?i)(error|exception|timeout|out of memory)/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100
properties.title: Lambda Error Logs (Last 100)

properties.query:
SOURCE logGroups(namePrefix: ["/aws/ecs/"], class: "STANDARD")  |
fields @timestamp, @entity.KeyAttributes.Name as Service, @message
| filter @message like /(?i)(error|exception|fatal|critical)/
| filter @log not like /containerinsights/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50
properties.title: [ECS] Error Logs (Last 50)
